cardInfo.cvvHint: El número CVV está en la parte de atrás de las tarjetas Visa, Mastercard y Discover. En las tajeras American Express está en el frente.
cardInfo.extraPercentageLabel: Translation of (Add 3% to cover processing fees)
cardInfo.extraPercentageInfoText: Translation of (By covering processing fees 100% of your donation will go to Mercy For Animals)

error.tokenizeError: Translation of (Error during secure card information transfer. Please try again.)
error.generalTokenizerError: Translation of (Unexpected error with secure card handler)

confirmation.emailReceiptText: Te enviaremos pronto un recibo de tu donación al correo electrónico.

transactionError.headline: Translation of (Oh no! There was an error:)

error.unknown: Translation of (The server was unable to process the transaction, but provided no explanation.)
